channel.title: Svgs on 学习笔记
channel.description: Recent content in Svgs on 学习笔记

item.title: stroke-dashoffset
item.description: stroke-dashoffset 显示属性 值 (百分比相对于viewport) | | inherit 初始值 1 动画系 yes 规范 SVG 1.1 (2nd Edition)

item.title: stroke-dasharray
item.description: 路径绘制动画 css @keyframes line { from { stroke-dasharray: 0 10000; } to { stroke-dasharray: 400 10000; } } .svg-dasharray { animation: 1.5s infinite line; } html <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/svg/2000" width="120" height="120" class="svg-dasharray" viewBox="0 0 110 110"> <path d="M 10 10 h 100 v 100 h -100 z" stroke-width="2" fill="none" stroke="black" /> </svg> 示例 @keyframes line { from { stroke-dasharray: 0 10000; } to { stroke-dasharray: 400 10000; }
